extendedInfo.description: "Ask the OT" is an information hotspot, created by Dr. Frederick Covington (award winning occupational therapist, inventor, author, lecturer), where occupational therapy subject matter will be explained in a user friendly manner without the medical jargon. An explanation of occupational therapy concepts will be discussed through real life examples and scenarios. Please feel free to submit any questions or comments that you may have. Also visit us at AskDrCovington.com.

reviews.title: Compatible
reviews.comment: Please make this compatible with Google nexus 7. I have the app on my phone and it is really informative but I\'d much rather watch the videos on my tablet.
reviews.author: Katherine Davies
